member.summary: Use one transaction for the whole session
member.remarks: The default transaction behavior is to use one transaction per migration.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether no connection should be used

member.name: T:FluentMigrator.Runner.TypeFinder
member.summary: Advanced searching and filtration of types collections.

member.name: M:FluentMigrator.Runner.TypeFinder.FilterByNamespace(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Type},System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Searches for types located in the specifying namespace and optionally in its nested namespaces.
member.param: Source types collection to search in.
Namespace to search types in. Set to null or empty string to search in all namespaces.
Set to true to search for types located in nested namespaces of . This parameter is ignored if is null or empty string.
member.returns: Collection of types matching specified criteria.

member.name: M:FluentMigrator.Runner.TypeFinder.IsInNamespace(System.Type,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Test if the type is in the given namespace
member.remarks: All types will be accepted when no namespace is given.
member.param: Indicates whether nested namespaces should be accepted
member.returns: true when the type is in the given namespace

member.name: P:FluentMigrator.Runner.VersionTableInfo.IVersionTableMetaData.ApplicationContext
member.summary: Provides access to ApplicationContext object.
member.remarks: ApplicationContext value is set by FluentMigrator immediately after instantiation of a class implementing IVersionTableMetaData and before any of properties of IVersionTableMetaData is called. Properties can use ApplicationContext value to implement context-depending logic.
